1.text: Name the three types of piece.
1.vid: /2/25/Solve a Rubiks Cube with the Layer Method Step 1 Version 5.360p.mp4

2.text: Learn how to talk about the six faces.
2.vid: /4/48/Solve a Rubiks Cube with the Layer Method Step 2 Version 5.360p.mp4

3.vid: /9/98/Solve a Rubiks Cube with the Layer Method Step 3 Version 5.360p.mp4

4.text: Add the number 2 to repeat the instruction.
4.vid: /b/b4/Solve a Rubiks Cube with the Layer Method Step 4 Version 5.360p.mp4

5.text: Refer to a specific piece of the cube.
5.vid: /e/eb/Solve a Rubiks Cube with the Layer Method Step 5 Version 5.360p.mp4

6.text: Turn the cube so the white center is on the U face.

7.text: Move white edges to the upper face to form a cross.
7.vid: /8/8e/Solve a Rubiks Cube with the Layer Method Step 7 Version 5.360p.mp4

8.text: Extend the cross down to the corners.
8.vid: /9/9e/Solve a Rubiks Cube with the Layer Method Step 8 Version 5.360p.mp4

9.text: Bring a white corner to the white face.
9.vid: /2/25/Solve a Rubiks Cube with the Layer Method Step 9 Version 5.360p.mp4

11.text: Find an edge piece in the D face that does not have yellow in it.

12.text: Turn the whole cube until the X center is the Front face.

13.vid: /d/df/Solve a Rubiks Cube with the Layer Method Step 13 Version 5.360p.mp4

14.text: Adjust the cube depending on the position of color Y.
14.vid: /6/6f/Solve a Rubiks Cube with the Layer Method Step 14 Version 2.360p.mp4

15.text: Repeat this step until the top two layers are finished.

16.text: Make adjustments if all of the D edge pieces include yellow.

17.text: Turn the cube so the U face has a yellow center.
17.vid: /d/d3/Solve a Rubiks Cube with the Layer Method Step 17 Version 2.360p.mp4

18.text: Make a plus sign on the yellow face.
18.vid: /9/9a/Solve a Rubiks Cube with the Layer Method Step 18 Version 2.360p.mp4

19.text: Bring a yellow corner to the upper face.

20.text: Repeat with the remaining yellow corners.

21.text: Rotate the U face until exactly one edge piece matches the color of the center it touches.
21.vid: /4/44/Solve a Rubiks Cube with the Layer Method Step 21 Version 2.360p.mp4

22.vid: /e/e5/Solve a Rubiks Cube with the Layer Method Step 22 Version 2.360p.mp4
